ValidationRule.description: This rule is to make sure an account is added to all contacts that are not an IEC/Counselor
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = False, NOT(ISPICKVAL( Persona__c , 'Independent Educational Consultant')), AND( ISNEW(), ISBLANK( AccountId)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter an account record in order to create a contact.
